stratagems.name: SHOULDER THE BURDEN
stratagems.fluff:
When faced with their darkest hour, knightly
Nobles rise to the challenge, for nothing
shall deter them from fulfilling their duty.
stratagems.target:
One Imperial Knights model
from your army that has lost one or
more wounds.
stratagems.effect:
Until the start of your next
Command phase, improve your model’s
Move, Toughness, Save, Leadership and
Objective Control characteristics by 1 and
each time your model makes an attack,
add 1 to the Hit roll.
stratagems.restrictions:
You can only use this
Stratagem once per battle. If your army
is Honoured, you can use this Stratagem
one additional time.

stratagems.name: ROTATE ION SHIELDS
stratagems.fluff:
Veteran Knight pilots can swiftly angle their
ion shields to better deflect incoming fire.
stratagems.when:
Your opponent’s Shooting phase,
just after an enemy unit has selected
its targets.
stratagems.target:
One Imperial Knights model
from your army that was selected as the
target of one or more of the attacking
unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase,
that Imperial Knights model has a 4+
invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

stratagems.name: THUNDERSTOMP
stratagems.fluff:
The Noble brings their Knight suit’s full
weight crashing down with the force of
an industrial piledriver. Few can survive
such a blow.
stratagems.target:
One Imperial Knights model
from your army that has not been
selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase,
your model cannot target Monster or
Vehicle units, but all melee weapons
equipped by your model have the
[DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

stratagems.name: SQUIRES' DUTY
stratagems.fluff:
Under the scrutiny and judgement of their
Noble betters, Armiger pilots will redouble
their efforts, attacking as one to smash
aside their foes.
stratagems.when:
The start of your Shooting phase or
the start of the Fight phase.
stratagems.target:
Two or more Armiger models
from your army and one enemy unit
that is an eligible target for all of those
Armiger models.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase,
improve the Strength and Armour
Penetration characteristics of weapons
equipped by those Armiger models by
1. If your army is Honoured, until the
end of the phase, add 1 to the Damage
characteristic of those weapons as well.

stratagems.name: TROPHY CLAIM
stratagems.fluff:
Once a mighty foe is laid low, the
victorious Knight’s emitters blare its
triumph, announcing the glory brought
to the Imperium, but shame awaits those
who fail in such confrontations.
stratagems.when:
Your Shooting phase or the
Fight phase.
stratagems.target:
One Imperial Knights model
from your army that has not been
selected to shoot or fight this phase, and
one enemy Monster or Vehicle unit.
stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, each
time your model makes an attack that
targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the
Wound roll. If your model destroys that
enemy unit this phase, you gain 1CP, but if
your model does not destroy that enemy
unit this phase, you cannot use this
Stratagem again for the rest of the battle.

stratagems.name: VALIANT LAST STAND
stratagems.fluff:
Badly wounded, their Knight’s generator
on the verge of overload, still the Noble
fights on, drawing upon their reserves of
chivalric heroism to sell their life as dearly
as they can.
stratagems.target:
One Imperial Knights model
from your army that was just destroyed
and that is eligible to fight but has not
been selected to fight this phase. You can
use this Stratagem on that model even
though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effect:
Before rolling to see if this model
deals any mortal wounds as a result of its
Deadly Demise ability, it can fight; when
doing so, it is assumed to have 1 wound
remaining, or all its wounds remaining
if your army is Honoured. After it has
finished resolving its attacks, resolve its
Deadly Demise ability as normal.
stratagems.restrictions:
You cannot target
Sir Hekhtur with this Stratagem.

enhancements.name: REVERED KNIGHT
enhancements.description: Imperial Knights model only. While a friendly Imperial Knights model is within 6" of the bearer, improve that model’s Leadership characteristic by 1. If your army is Honoured, increase the range of this Aura ability to 12".

enhancements.name: MYSTERIOUS GUARDIAN
enhancements.description: Imperial Knights model only. The bearer has the Deep Strike ability. Once per battle, at the end of your opponent’s turn, if the bearer is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can fade away. If it does, remove it from the battlefield then, in the Reinforcements step of your subsequent Movement phase, set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models. If the battle ends and the bearer is not on the battlefield, it is destroyed

enhancements.name: MYTHIC HERO
enhancements.description: Questoris model with a Bondsman ability only. Each time the bearer uses its Bondsman ability, you can select one additional friendly Armiger model within 12" of the bearer that is not already being affected by a Bondsman ability. Until the start of your next Command phase, that model is also affected by that Bondsman ability.

enhancements.name: BANNER OF MACHARIUS TRIUMPHANT
enhancements.description: Imperial Knights model only. If you control an objective marker at the end of your Command phase and the bearer is within range of that objective marker, that objective marker remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

enhancements.name: UNYIELDING PARAGON
enhancements.description: Questoris model only. Each time an attack is allocated to the bearer, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

datasheets.name: Acastus Knight Asterius
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 Asterius volkite culverins; karacnos mortar battery; 2 twin conversion beam cannons; titanic feet.
wargear: None

other.name: Sunderer of Fortresses
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Vehicle, improve the Strength and Damage characteristics of that attack by 1. If that attack targets a Fortification, improve the Strength and Damage characteristics of that attack by 2 instead.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-10 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Conversion
abilities.description: Each time an attack made with this weapon targets a unit more than 12" from the bearer, an unmodified successful Hit roll of 4+ scores a Critical Hit.

other.name: Acheron’s Duty (Bondsman)
other.description: While a model is affected by this ability, at the start of the Fight phase, each enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more units with this ability must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result when they do.

other.name: Searing Flames
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with an Acheron flame cannon. Until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

other.description: While a model is affected by this ability, each time that model makes an attack that targets a Titanic or Towering model, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

other.name: Macro-extinction Protocols
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Hit roll. If that target is Titanic or Towering, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

other.name: Storm of Bolts
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles) hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while this model is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

While a unit is grav-pinned, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

datasheets.name: Sir Hekhtur
datasheets.loadout: Sir Hekhtur is equipped with: Hekhtur’s pistol; close combat weapon.

special.name: USING SIR HEKHTUR
special.description: When your Canis Rex model is destroyed, Sir Hekhtur is treated as a model disembarking from a destroyed Transport – set him up within 3" of your Canis Rex model before it is removed. Sir Hekhtur then uses the profile, wargear, abilities and keywords shown on this side of the card, but cannot be  selected as the target of any of your Stratagems other than Core Stratagems. Your Canis Rex unit is not considered to be destroyed until Sir Hekhtur is also destroyed.
